SetColor.Description: Sets the color of the team from one of the 16 supported colors: black, dark_blue, dark_green, dark_aqua, dark_red, dark_purple, gold, gray, dark_gray, blue, green, aqua, red, light_purple, yellow, white

AddPlayer.Description: Adds a player into the team

AddEntity.Description: Adds an entity into the team

RemoveEntity.Description: Removes an entity from the team

RemovePlayer.Description: Removes a player from the team

Remove.Description: Removes the team from the server

SetPrefix.Description: Sets the prefix of the team

GetPrefix.Description: Returns the prefix of the team

SetSuffix.Description: Sets the suffix of the team

GetSuffix.Description: Returns the suffix of the team

SetOption.Description: Sets the option for the team Argument 1: NAME_TAG_VISIBILITY, DEATH_MESSAGE_VISIBILITY, COLLISION_RULE Argument 2: ALWAYS, NEVER, HIDE_FOR_OTHER_TEAMS, HIDE_FOR_OWN_TEAM
